name: World Mahjong (Original)
description:
◆This board game is a mahjong game played by 4 people or computer.

You can play with 3 ai users by yourself, Or you can play Mahjong with 3 other real users.

◆This game supports traditional [Chinese mahjong] and [Japanese riich mahjong].

Tutorials, practice( single play mode ), and online play ( 4 user play mode ) supported.
We provide two styles of mahjong tiles for western players unfamiliar with mahjong games.

◆You can learn how to play Mahjong by investing only 10 minutes in the tutorial.


This game requires a network connection for online play. If the network connection is not smooth, the game will not play normally.
The game also supports single play game with AI players.

◆Mahjong is a game that requires skill.
Our games are played by thousands of real users every day.
More than 30% of users have played this game more than 10,000 times.
You'll have to play that much and you'll be of average skill.
If you are in doubt about the game opponent, please report it using the replay function.

◆This game has in-app purchase items.
You can purchase 3, 5, 9, 30, or 50 gold items.

Purchased gold can be used to exchange for game money, avatars, and other items.

Many Mahjong players await your challenge.
